About + Connect

Hello! I'm a Designer in the Mid-Atlantic region specializing in education/university design.
After a ten-year immersion in print, I've returned to web development!
Jekyll looked unique, refreshing and offered lots of tutorials and beautiful templates like this one.

Please reach me via the social media links below. Thanks for stopping by!
